sqldiff.help:
USE: The diffs are ordered by datamodel version number. The script can be run in a top down fashion and is expected to not fail or overwrite old data
EXPECT: - "use business-database-name;" was called prior to calling this script

diff.author: Tammy Dugan
Steve McKee
diff.description: Add indexes to the new chirdlutilbackports_patient_state table.
diff.sql: create index cub_pat_state_idx_location on chirdlutilbackports_patient_state (location_id,location_tag_id,retired,state); create index cub_pat_state_idx_instance on chirdlutilbackports_patient_state (location_id,form_id,form_instance_id,retired);

diff.author: Steve McKee
diff.description: Create new chirdlutilbackports_obs_attribute and chirdlutilbackports_obs_attribute_value tables.

diff.author: Steve McKee
Dave Ely
diff.description: CHICA-633 Create new chirdlutilbackports_encounter_attribute and chirdlutilbackports_encounter_attribute_value tables.
